name: Vegan Banana French Toast with Caramelized Bananas
description: Vegan Banana French Toast. Vegan French Toast with Caramelized bananas. Banana and non dairy milk make up the french toast batter. Cooked French toast is served with caramelized Bananas, maple and vegan butter. Vegan Nut-free Recipe. Makes 8 to 10 slices depending on size of bread

video.name: Banana French Toast with Caramelized Bananas | Vegan Richa Recipes
video.description:
Vegan Banana French Toast with Caramelized Bananas.
FULL RECIPE: https://www.veganricha.com/2017/06/vegan-banana-french-toast.html

Vegan French Toast. Banana and non dairy milk make up the french toast batter. Serve the Cooked French toast with nutmeg spiced caramelized Bananas, maple and vegan butter. Nut-free Recipe. Kid-approved!


BUY MY BOOK: http://www.veganricha.com/vrekaz 

SUBSCRIBE: https://www.youtube.com/veganricharecipes?sub_confirmation=1

recipeIngredient: 1  loaf day old rustic bread or sourdough (sliced)
1/2 cup non dairy milk such as almond milk
a very good pinch of salt and black pepper
2 tbsp coconut sugar or vegan brown sugar
a good pinch of cinnamon or nutmeg

recipeInstructions.text: Blend everything under french toast batter and transfer to a shallow bowl.
recipeInstructions.name: Blend everything under french toast batter and transfer to a shallow bowl.

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a skillet over medium heat. Add oil and spread.
recipeInstructions.name: Heat a skillet over medium heat. Add oil and spread.

recipeInstructions.text: Place bread slice in the batter for 2 seconds, then flip and soak for another 2 seconds. Remove the batter and let the excess fall off for 2 to 3 seconds. Place in the hot skillet.
recipeInstructions.name: Place bread slice in the batter for 2 seconds, then flip and soak for another 2 seconds. Remove the batter and let the excess fall off for 2 to 3 seconds. Place in the hot skillet.

recipeInstructions.text: Cook for 4 to 6 minutes per side. If your stove runs hot, cook at medium low heat.
recipeInstructions.name: Cook for 4 to 6 minutes per side. If your stove runs hot, cook at medium low heat.

recipeInstructions.text: You want to cook the batter really well and caramelize the banana in it but not burn it. If the french toast is not done, the bread will not release from the pan easily. Let it cook another minute or so. Flip and cook the other side.
recipeInstructions.name: You want to cook the batter really well and caramelize the banana in it but not burn it. If the french toast is not done, the bread will not release from the pan easily. Let it cook another minute or so. Flip and cook the other side.

recipeInstructions.text: Place in a serving plate, Add a helping of the caramelized bananas, some fresh fruit, maple syrup and vegan butter and serve immediately.
recipeInstructions.name: Place in a serving plate, Add a helping of the caramelized bananas, some fresh fruit, maple syrup and vegan butter and serve immediately.

itemListElement.text: Combine banana slices, sugar and non dairy milk, nutmeg and a pinch of salt in a skillet over medium heat. Cook until the mixture thickens. about 6 minutes. Stir occasionally. Make a double batch of these to serve on the side or over oatmeal.
itemListElement.name: Combine banana slices, sugar and non dairy milk, nutmeg and a pinch of salt in a skillet over medium heat. Cook until the mixture thickens. about 6 minutes. Stir occasionally. Make a double batch of these to serve on the side or over oatmeal.
